channel.title: Help on making a quest
channel.description:
ok i want to make a quest but i have no idea on how to get the quest journal to say the name of the quest and nothing else and when u start it to turn yellow and when ur finished to stay green and not go back to red when u log out and back in.
and i need to know how to make like a screen pop up and tell u what to do so if u know how to do this i would appreciate it if u would tell me thnx

item.title: Help on making a quest
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

You have to clearly state that it has done the quest. Like save it in a way.

Making it go yellow once started:

Add an int. Like

public int StartedQuest = 0;

If its npc related, you could do…

StartedQuest = 1;

Then in your quest tab, it could look something like…

if (StartedQuest == 1) {
sendQuest("@yel@Quest, ###");
else if(StartedQuest == 2) {
sendQuest("@gre@Quest, ###");
else if(StartedQuest == 0) {
sendQuest("@red@Quest, ###");

Thats probably wrong. But haay. You can change it. and improve alot

Read full topic
